body.name: ANCOBER Wireless Bluetooth Portable Speaker 15W Stereo Sound with Multi LED Light Dynamic Modes, IPX4 Waterproof Bluetooth Speakers, BT5.3, TWS Surround Pairing, Lightweight for Party Outdoor Camping
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 50 mins
features: Immersive Clear Sound & Dual Playing : Crafted for distortion-free sound, this wireless Bluetooth speaker uses unparalleled 15W HiFi sound quality and advanced technology to deliver powerful, balanced sound with minimal distortion. You can connect two speakers together to create an immersive, high-fidelity stereo experience, filling any room with up to 30W(15W*2) of powerful sound. Perfect for gaming, music and movie playback.

Multiple Cool Dynamics Light Modes : LED light bluetooth speaker offering multiple RGB lighting dynamics modes, it is easy for you to customize the lighting effects to meet your preferences with the push of a light button. Make any party more memorable with these visually stunning light effects.The last 2 modes will beat the music, and the higher the volume, the more obvious the lighting effect.

A Truly Portable Speaker : This is a lightweight wireless portable speaker, 7.1 inches high, 2.7x2.3x2.7 inches of bottom edge length, weighing only 0.79lb, with Type-C charging port and auxiliary-in port(charge cable and AUX cable are included), you can carry it anywhere outdoors and indoors including camping, hiking, biking, office, etc.

Splashproof & Waterproof : Ancober wireless bluetooth speaker adopts durable design and IPX4 waterproof rating. It's ideal for outdoor activities, perfect for use at party, pool, beach, car, boat, golf cart, RV, bike, camping or hiking, and more. IPX4 protects against water splashes and spills, resists light water spray and splashes, and does not partially or fully submerge the speaker in water.

Fast Connection & Uninterrupted Calls : Advanced Bluetooth 5.3 technology supports fast and stable connection with the vast majority of Bluetooth devices including cell phones, computers, TVs, tablets, VR, game controller, etc. within 33 feet range. Built-in microphone, you can completely free your hands to enjoy uninterrupted clear and uninterrupted calls from the wireless Bluetooth speaker.

A Great Gift Choice : ANCOBER speakers are not only excellent sound quality, but also exquisite and fashionable design is very creative, these are perfect gifts for men, women, yourself, teenagers, youth, girls, boys, him, her, parents, friends, teachers and more on Christmas Day, New Year, Valentine's Day, birthday, Father's Day, Mother's Day, school season, graduation season, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ANCOBER LED Light Wireless Bluetooth Speaker

Clear HiFi Stereo Sound Audio Full rage of audio high-fidelity sound ANCOBER Wireless Bluetooth speakers, with comfortable low volume, comfortable mid-range and bright effect treble, bring you a smooth listening experience and full range of audio.

ANCOBER LED light Wireless Bluetooth Speakers designed multi universal frequency dynamic light modes and 2 beating music lighting modes to suit your needs for different occasion atmospheres. (The higher the volume, the more obvious the lighting effect of these ) You can also turn off the LED lights.

TWS/Dual Pairing By pairing 2 led light Bluetooth speakers to play at the same time to get louder surrounded stereo and dual-channel sound effect, can be perfect for movies, TV's and games, etc. Lightweight and Portable ACB-001 wireless Bluetooth speaker is a truly portable speaker, with super light weight, it is easy for you to carry to any place to enjoy music and light show. IPX4 Waterproof Can protect Bluetooth speakers from water-splash, globs and vapor. You can use it in bathroom and anywhere else indoors or outdoors (Don't submerge the audio in water directly). Fast to Pairing Advanced Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity tech for fast and stable connection with your smart Bluetooth devices such as iOS, Android, cellphone, PC, computer, Windows devices and TV, VR etc. Built-in Microphone This wireless Bluetooth speaker built-in microphone, in the Bluetooth range you can make clear calls without interruption.
Long Battery Life USB Type-C Charge Port and AUX-in Port

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed!!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the ANCOBER Wireless Bluetooth Portable Speaker, and it has exceeded all my expectations. From its sleek design to its impressive audio quality, this little powerhouse has become my go-to companion for music on the go.First and foremost, the portability of this speaker is a game-changer. It's compact and lightweight, making it easy to toss into my bag for impromptu outings. The sleek design is not only visually appealing but also durable enough to withstand the rigors of daily use.Setting up the Bluetooth connection was a breeze – within seconds, I was wirelessly streaming my favorite tunes. The connectivity range is impressive, allowing me to keep my phone in my pocket while enjoying uninterrupted music throughout my home.Now, let's talk about the sound quality – it's simply outstanding for a speaker of this size. The ANCOBER speaker delivers a rich, well-balanced sound with surprisingly deep bass. Whether I'm listening to rock, jazz, or podcasts, the audio remains crystal clear, and the volume can fill a room without any distortion.Battery life is another standout feature. I've used the speaker for extended periods without needing to recharge, and the built-in battery indicator ensures I'm never caught off guard.Additionally, the speaker's multifunctionality goes beyond just music. It serves as a reliable hands-free device for calls, and the intuitive controls on the top make adjusting volume, skipping tracks, and answering calls a breeze.In conclusion, the ANCOBER Wireless Bluetooth Portable Speaker is a fantastic investment for anyone in search of a compact, high-performance audio solution. Its blend of style, portability, and impressive sound quality make it an unbeatable companion for music enthusiasts on the move. I couldn't be happier with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price and very versatile use!
reviews.reviewText: This is the first blue tooth speaker that I ever bought and it is a great one. It has impressive audio quality and easy connectivity to my phone. Light ups keep the room pretty even in the dark and works great while in the shower. Can easily fit anywhere, often use in my kitchen or bathroom. It is also very affordable. Would definitely buy as a gift next time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Bluetooth Speaker.
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for an affordable Bluetooth speaker for many weeks and this one was the perfect purchase. I have created a little pro and con list for you all to check out if you are interested in buying one of these:Pros:-One of the things I like about it is the RGB rainbow effect meaning I have a little light show while I'm playing videos.-The best thing about this device is the USB C charger. This is great for me because almost all of my stuff these days needs C type and having to lug around a mini usb just isn't gonna cut it for me.The battery life for the speaker is pretty good, I use it for when I'm watching videos at night and often times I'll wake up nearly 8 or 9 hours later to the sound still coming out. Just goes to show how much juice this thing can handle.Cons:-One of the slight 'problems' I have with the speaker is that every now and then, the bluetooth connection will cut out and pause the video. Its not really a deal breaker because they include an aux cord so my little 'issue' is just me being lazy to plug the cord in.-a "problem that I do have is the noise level when i am turning the speaker on and off or when the battery is low. I dont think there is a setting for the booting up sounds so its often times pretty loud. The running low battery can and pretty much will wake you up from a deep sleep. Of course, thats only if you dont charge up before using it again.Overall, its a solid piece of kit and i would recommend anyone looking to get a speaker grab this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for price
reviews.reviewText: This speaker is an all around fairly solid speaker. It’s got decent sound quality and it’s easy to set up. My only complaint is the battery life seems to be a little short but I don’t mind it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Bluetooth Speaker!
reviews.reviewText: I like my Ancober speaker! Pairing via Bluetooth from phone or laptop is quick and easy. The sound quality is excellent for a speaker its size. It has decent bass-response on the low-end and does not sound "tinny" on the high-end. It's lightweight, very portable, and it "feels" good, too, like it is made very well. There are several settings on the light display: turn it off, have it pulse to the music, or just have an ever-changing array of colors to delight your soul! Buttons on the speaker allow changing tracks or volume if the connected device (phone, laptop) isn't within reach. This is definitely one of the best purchases I have made recently! The "PowerOn" and "Pairing" sounds are a little louder than I would like, but that's the only downside to this product! Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely the best portable speaker I’ve ever used!
reviews.reviewText: This speaker I got when I couldn’t use my Alexa when I first moved AGAIN.I was super stoked to find the volume on this beautiful baby- powerful and booming!It seriously could have been turned up more, only it was loud enough!Changes colors and is pretty freaking cool anytime I use it! It is probably the best portable speaker I’ve ever used, ever bought and will ever buy again! Stays charged for a good amount of time I’ve been able to use it for a few hours cleaning off and on for about four days until it needs charging again.The only downside is whenever anyone would call it would make an awful noise that you can’t stop unless you walk over to the speaker and turn it off because even pressing a button on my own phone didn’t stop the sound on the Bluetooth speaker and if you press the sound button down while someone’s calling it will answer the phone to them- so you have to just turn off the speaker! Haha!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something to use in my kitchen while cooking. This speaker was better than I ever expected. The price was perfect and a great buy. I have a more expensive speaker, this one works just as well or better. The sound is great. The lights are very cool. I plan to purchase another to use in our shop. The speaker feels well made and is very easy to use. Highly recommend.
